Allows you to remove photos and files from a Sendible message.

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v1/media.format

====Formats:====
Replace {{{format}}} with either {{{xml}}} or {{{json}}}

====HTTP Methods:====
DELETE

====Parameters:====
 * {{{application_id}}}: Your application id from http://sendible.com/developers.
 * {{{media_id}}}: The id of the photo or file to remove.

====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the Sendible user.

====Success Response:====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<result><status>success</status></result>
}}}

====Error Response:====
{{{
<error>
<type>InvalidUsernamePassword</type>
<message>Username/password is invalid.</message>
</error>
}}}

OR

{{{
<error>
<type>MediaNotFoundError</type>
<message>Media could not be found.</message>
</error>
}}}
